title: Video: An Annotated Look at One Piece Punk Hazard Arc Animation Highlights
author: Crunchyroll Editorial
description: An annotated analysis of the animation highlights from the Punk Hazard Arc, including episodes from the arc's beginning where Episode 581 introduced key characters like Caesar Clown and Monet.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Punk Hazard arc

title: One Piece Episodes 581-582 Discussion
author: UnevenEdge Community
description: Community discussion thread about Episodes 581-582 of One Piece, covering the introduction of the dismembered samurai and Caesar Clown.

title: One Piece (Punk Hazard) Anime Review and Discussion
author: DoubleSama
description: A comprehensive review and discussion of the Punk Hazard arc, analyzing the story arc from episodes 579-625, including the introduction of major characters in Episode 581.

title: 581-582: The Strawhats Stunned! Enter: a Samurai's Horrifying Severed Head! and Startling! The Secret of the Island is Finally Revealed!
author: Never Watched One Piece Blog
description: A blog post reviewing episodes 581-582 from the perspective of someone watching One Piece for the first time, discussing the introduction of Kin'emon and the mysteries of Punk Hazard.

title: The One Piece Podcast - Early 2013 Episodes
author: The One Piece Podcast Team
description: The One Piece Podcast has been covering episodes weekly since 2009. Their January 2013 episodes would have covered Episode 581's air date, discussing the Punk Hazard arc as it aired.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Weekly episode discussion from original air date

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 581 UNCUT REACTION!
author: Patreon Creator
description: An uncut reaction video to One Piece Episode 581, showing a first-time viewer's response to the introduction of the dismembered samurai and Caesar Clown.
